page.title: 14Car Survey in Glanaman.
page.content:
A survey was made of cars passing along the A474 through the village of Glanaman. The countries of origin, the ages and the colours of the cars were categorised. The results were as follows:
{COUNTRIES OF ORIGIN AGES OF CARS Great Britain 84% 0- 2 years 2% France 5% 3- 4 years 20% Japan 4% 5- 6 years 19% Germany 3.5% 7- 8 years 18% Italy 2% 9-10 years 14% Sweden 1.5% 11-12 years 12% over12 years 15% {COLOURS OF CARS Blue 26% Fawn 6% Red 19% Silver 5% White 11% Orange 4% Green 9% Black 4% Yellow 6% Others 4% Brown 6%
